item.description:
The Museum of Science has been around forever.  It has come a long way since the days when a lot of us were schoolkids.  Join us to take in the sights and sounds(including the Musical Stairs)of this great place.  The Museum will have extended hours for the Presidents' Day weekend, allowing us a late afternoon visit.  General admission for the exhibit halls is $22.00 for adults, and tickets may be purchased in advance on-line.  Tickets purchased on-line can be printed at the tickets kiosks in the lobby. http://www.mos.org/ http://www.mos.org/admission

https://store.mos.org/

A lot of local libraries offer passes with discounted admission prices.

 

 

 

After a few hours at the Museum of Science we can make our way(walking distance) over to the The Helmand in Cambridge.  The Helmand offers warm service, wonderful atmosphere, and delicately flavored Afghani cuisine.

http://www.helmandrestaurant.com/

 

Our dinner reservation is for 7:15 pm at the Helmand.

We will plan on leaving the museum a little after 6:30 to walk or drive over to the restaurant.

 

Sorry, we will be unable to provide individual requests for services. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: Near the ticket kiosks in the lobby

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: An Intellectual Afternoon of Science, A Tasty Evening at The Helmand
